body:
Morning All,

I am having some problems with the install of Honeybee.   I have followed the installation instructions and also installed radiance, daysim, energy plus, and falsecolor. But the bug still gives me an error with the attached message.  Any ideas on what i may have done incorrectly?



Thanks!

replies.body: Hi Jim. My best guess is that you left Radiance installation folder to default and it is installed under c:\program files\radiance. You need to re-install it under c:\radiance.
